headline: Trump Trade: President to sign EO on DOE, weighing Chevron license extension
summary: Catch up on the top industries and stocks that were impacted, or were predicted to be impacted, by the comments, actions and policies of President Donald Trump with this daily recap compiled by The Fly: DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION: President Donald Trump is expected to sign an executive order Thursday to close the Education Department, fulfilling a yearslong pledge to dismantle the federal agency, the White House confirmed, report Garrett Haake, Nnamdi Egwuonwu and Tyler Kingkade of NBC News. Trump
